description: This Dart script is a CI utility for a Flutter project, automating directory setup and executing Flutter commands like version check, dependency fetching, analysis, and testing with coverage.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronously runs CI steps: sets directory, runs multiple Flutter commands, handles errors.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes a shell command with arguments, streams output, and handles non-zero exit codes.
